rules_text: When Aether Sculptor enters, create a tapped colorless artifact token named Lotus Petal with “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.”
rules_text2: Target noncreature artifact you control becomes a 0/0 artifact creature. Put three +1/+1 counters on it.
notes: !append2 (Cast a copy of this spell once while this creature is on the battlefield.)
